definition: when the time comes/at the scheduled time
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)

sentences.english: Nearby performers would stop at that time.
sentences.chinese: 鄰近的表演者屆時會暫停。

sentences.english: If couldn t hand in the finished product, he wishes will be dashed.
sentences.chinese: 屆時若交不出成品，蘭博士的心願就要落空了。

sentences.english: On those days Mercury will conjoin Jupiter, a lovely influence.
sentences.chinese: 屆時水星將結合木星，產生可愛的影響力。

sentences.english: Special Envoy Cai Wu will attend relevant celebration activities.
sentences.chinese: 屆時蔡武特使將出席喀方有關慶祝活動。

sentences.english: No winter lasts forever, no spring skips its turn. ) --- Hal Borland.
sentences.chinese: 沒有永留不去的冬天，也無屆時不至的春天。

sentences.english: The results will all be cataloged online.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果屆時可供在線查詢。

sentences.english: I suggest you refer your questions to him.
sentences.chinese: 我建議你屆時向胡部助提出這個問題。

sentences.english: Digitised commodity money may then be in store for us.
sentences.chinese: 屆時，我們或許可以採用數字化“商品貨幣”。

sentences.english: Some distant royals would be excluded from the royal system.
sentences.chinese: 屆時，一些“二線”王室員將被排除於體制外。

sentences.english: Some Chinese demographers worry that the country will get old before getting rich.
sentences.chinese: 一些中國人口專家擔憂屆時可能面臨未富先老的問題。

sentences.english: That might make Brazil a top-five source of oil .
sentences.chinese: 屆時巴西將躋身於全球前五大石油產地。

sentences.english: The time appointed for the mass meeting was 9 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆大會上午9點屆時召開。

sentences.english: Then you will see the moon shot.
sentences.chinese: 屆時，你會看到那一“奔月”的壯舉。

sentences.english: Conference organizers hope they'll have a deal on the table for signing.
sentences.chinese: 會議組織者希望屆時能拿出一份協議讓代表們簽字。

sentences.english: Of course the main body parts will then have sharp-edged connections and no gaps.
sentences.chinese: 當然，主體部分，屆時將有尖銳的邊連接和沒有差距。

sentences.english: At that time, a patient would swallow another drug-containing capsule.
sentences.chinese: 屆時病人將會服下另一顆含有藥物的膠囊。
